0.7.name: wordpress/seo-easy-optimizer-seo
0.7.description:
SEO Easy Optimizer helps you in the hard improving of the SEO positioning for your blog. How? It analyses your pages' source and provides useful advice to obtain a better search engine positioning.

SEO Easy Optimizer checks:

  • Presence of h1 tag in homepage
  • Presence of h1 tag in posts
  • Presence of the sitemap.xml file
  • Presence of title and alt attributes in img tags

Then advices you to:

  • Check your head part of the source code and verify that the title, meta description and canonical tags are present and well-used.
  • Register your blog to free stats services like Alexa and Google Anlytics
  • Provide your RSS feed via FeedBurner
  • Use Digg and other similar web-services

Special thanks to IdeaGeek.it for idea sharing and project supporting. Checkout its latest posts about iPhone 5 and
